page.title: 03TRANSPORT
page.content: Hoyland is served by both buses and {trains.}The railway is a local line serving stations between Leeds and Sheffield where you can join the inter-city service for the rest of the country.Diesel multiple units run along the line with a conductor on each train. The{buses}that run to and from Hoyland are organised by the South Yorkshire Transport Executive.This executive organises the Yorkshire Traction buses in South Yorkshire and buses from Sheffield,Rotherham and Doncaster. Buses run from Hoyland to Barnsley, Wentworth, Rotherham, Sheffield, High Green, Mexborough, Wombwell with connecting services in Barnsley, Rotherham and Sheffield.South Yorkshire is famous for its cheap bus fares.Most people do own their own car.
